casebody.data:
KORNEGAY FAMILY FARMS, LLC, et al.
v.
CROSS CREEK SEED, INC. 187PA16-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. September 29, 2016 Andrew H. Erteschik, Attorney at Law, Steven B. Epstein, Attorney at Law, Raleigh, For Cross Creek Seed, Inc. L. Neal Ellis, Jr., Attorney at Law, Wake Forest, J. P. Williamson, Jr., Attorney at Law, For Kornegay Family Farms, LLC, et al. Matthew N. Leerberg, Attorney at Law, Raleigh, For N.C. Association of Defense Attorneys.

The following order has been entered on the Motion for Extension of Time to File Brief filed on the 28th of September 2016 by Defendant:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 29th of September 2016."

Defendant shall have up to and including the 23rd day of November 2016 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court.
